short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension double checks your critical information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For online shoppers who need to manage multiple accounts on different websites, our Chrome extension is a smart tool that helps you double check your shipping information before placing the order, and offers shortcuts to autofill. Unlike Chrome Autofill which blindly fills in historical data,  EZCheck uses color and name to highlight the specific tag you want to choose, and prompts user to update any mismatched/outdated information.
